comment:
Extracted Variables:
1. W: Number of wraps to produce
2. P: Number of platters to produce

Definitions:
- W, P: Both are integers representing the quantities of wraps and platters to be produced, respectively.

Constraints:
1. 5W + 7P ≥ 3000 (meat constraint)
2. 3W + 5P ≥ 2500 (rice constraint)
3. W ≥ 3P (at least 3 times as many wraps as platters)

Objective:
Minimize total production time: 10W + 8P
